trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the first node in this node-set will be returned. If this argument is omitted, the current context node will be used.
trans-unit.target: 将返回这个节点集中第一个节点的命名空间URI。如果省略这个参数,将使用当前的上下文节点。

trans-unit.source: The namespace declarations are determined by the xslt-param-namespace PIs, see below.
trans-unit.target: 名称空间声明由 xslt-param-namespace PI确定，请参见下文。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the parameter name. No syntax checking is done on the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 参数名的命名空间。不对该属性进行语法检查。

trans-unit.source: The namespace the prefix maps to.
trans-unit.target: 前缀映射到的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The nearest integer greater than or equal to number.
trans-unit.target: 大于或等于 number 的最接近的整数。

trans-unit.source: The nearest integer greater than or equal to number.
trans-unit.target: 大于或等于 number 的最接近的整数。

trans-unit.source: The nearest integer less than or equal to number.
trans-unit.target: 小于或等于 number 的最接近的整数。

trans-unit.source: The nearest integer less then, greater than, or equal to
trans-unit.target: 小于、大于或等于的最接近的整数。

trans-unit.source: The nearest integer less then, greater than, or equal todecimal.
trans-unit.target: 小于，大于或等于 decimal 的最接近整数。

trans-unit.source: The node set to be counted.
The node-set to be evaluated. Each node in this node-set is evaluated as if it were passed to the number() function, and a sum of the resulting numbers is returned.
trans-unit.target: 要评估的节点集。评估该节点集中的每个节点，就像将其传递给number（）函数一样，并返回结果总数。

trans-unit.source: The object to be converted to a number. If this argument is omitted, the current context node will be used.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为数字的对象。如果省略此参数,将使用当前的上下文节点。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert to a string. If omitted, the context node is used.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为字符串的对象。如果省略,则使用上下文节点。

trans-unit.source: The outermost element in an XSLT stylesheet must be the <xsl:stylesheet> element (an acceptable alternate is the <xsl:transform> element). This element will include at least one namespace declaration and the mandatory version attribute. Other namespaces and three optional attributes may also be included.
trans-unit.target: XSLT样式表中最外面的元素必须是 <xsl:stylesheet> 元素（可接受的替代方法是 <xsl:transform> 元素）。该元素将至少包括一个名称空间声明和强制版本属性。也可以包括其他名称空间和三个可选属性。

trans-unit.source: The position withinstring the substring begins
The result of the processor's action is also a tree. Netscape uses this tree to render the contents in the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 处理器的操作结果也是一棵树。Netscape使用这棵树来渲染浏览器窗口中的内容。

trans-unit.source: The result of this expression is an XPathResult object. If we wish to know the type of result returned, we may evaluate the resultType property of the returned object. In this case, that will evaluate to 4, an UNORDERED_NODE_ITERATOR_TYPE. This is the default return type when the result of the XPath expression is a node set. It provides access to a single node at a time and may not return nodes in a particular order. To access the returned nodes, we use the iterateNext() method of the returned object:
trans-unit.target: 该表达式的结果是一个 XPathResult 对象。如果我们想知道返回结果的类型，可以评估返回对象的 resultType 属性。在这种情况下，其值为 4 ，即 UNORDERED_NODE_ITERATOR_TYPE 。当XPath表达式的结果是节点集时，这是默认的返回类型。它一次提供对单个节点的访问，并且可能不按特定顺序返回节点。要访问返回的节点，我们使用返回对象的 iterateNext() 方法：

trans-unit.source: The resultant object depends on the output method of the stylesheet:
trans-unit.target: 结果对象取决于样式表的输出方法：

trans-unit.source: The resultant object depends on the output method of the stylesheet:
trans-unit.target: 结果对象取决于样式表的输出方法：

trans-unit.source: The resulting number after converting the object.
trans-unit.target: 转换对象后的结果数字。

trans-unit.source: The returned node-set will contain every node that has this value for the given key.
trans-unit.target: 返回的节点集将包含对给定的键有这个值的每个节点。

trans-unit.source: The returned variable xpathResult from document.evaluate can either be composed of individual nodes (simple types), or a collection of nodes (node-set types).
trans-unit.target: 从 document.evaluate 返回的变量 xpathResult 可以由单个节点（简单类型）组成，也可以由节点集合（节点集类型）组成。

trans-unit.source: The same id must be generated every time for the same node in the current document in the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: 在当前转换中,每次都必须为当前文档中的同一节点生成相同的id。

trans-unit.source: The second object to consider returning.
trans-unit.target: 第二个要考虑返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: The separation of content and presentation is a key design feature of XML. The structure of an XML document is designed to reflect and clarify important relationships among the individual aspects of the content itself, unhindered by a need to provide any indication about how this data should eventually be presented. This intelligent structuring is particularly important as more and more data transfers are automated and take place between highly heterogeneous machines linked by a network.
trans-unit.target: 内容和表示的分离是XML的关键设计功能。XML文档的结构旨在反映和阐明内容本身各个方面之间的重要关系，而无需提供任何有关最终应如何显示此数据的指示。随着越来越多的数据传输自动化并在通过网络链接的高度异构的机器之间进行，这种智能化的结构尤为重要。

trans-unit.source: The simplest way to indicate which XSLT stylesheet should be used to process a particular XML document is to include a processing instruction in the XML document itself. For example, if the stylesheet is called inventory.xsl and resides in the same directory as the xml document, the processing instruction in the xml document would look like this:
trans-unit.target: 最简单的方法是在XML文档中包含一个处理指令,来指示应该使用哪个XSLT样式表来处理一个特定的XML文档。例如,如果样式表被称为 inventory.xsl,并且与xml文档位于同一目录下,那么xml文档中的处理指令将是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The string of characters that will be replaced.
The string of characters used for replacement. The first character in XYZ will replace every occurrence of the first character in abc that appears in string.
trans-unit.target: 用于替换的字符串。 XYZ 中的第一个字符将替换出现在 string 中的 abc 中第一个字符的所有出现。

trans-unit.source: The string of characters used for replacement. The first character inXYZ will replace every occurance of the first character inabc that appears instring.
trans-unit.target: 用于替换的字符串。 XYZ 中的第一个字符将替换出现在 string 中的 abc 中第一个字符的所有出现。

trans-unit.source: The string to be evaluated. Part of this string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要评估的字符串。该字符串的一部分将被返回。

trans-unit.source: The string to be normalized. If omitted, string used will be the same as the context node converted to a string.
trans-unit.target: 要规范化的字符串。如果省略,使用的字符串将与上下文节点转换为字符串相同。

trans-unit.source: The string to evaluate. If omitted, string used will be the same as the context node converted to a string.
trans-unit.target: 要评估的字符串。如果省略,使用的字符串将与转换为字符串的上下文节点相同。

trans-unit.source: The string to look for as a substring of haystack
trans-unit.target: 要作为 haystack 的子字符串查找的字符串

trans-unit.source: The string to look for as a substring of haystack
trans-unit.target: 要作为 haystack 的子字符串查找的字符串

trans-unit.source: The substring to search for. Everything after the first occurence of
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的子串.第一次出现的

trans-unit.source: The substring to search for. Everything after the first occurrence ofneedle inhaystack will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的子字符串。第一次出现后，一切 needle 在 haystack 将被退回。

trans-unit.source: The substring to search for. Everything before the first occurance of
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的子串.在第一次出现

trans-unit.source: The substring to search for. Everything before the first occurrence ofneedle inhaystack will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的子字符串。第一次出现之前，一切 needle 在 haystack 将被退回。

trans-unit.source: The tree consists of a hierarchical framework of nodes. It can be made up of seven different types of nodes: the single root node, element nodes, text nodes, attribute nodes, comment nodes, processing instruction nodes, and namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: 树由节点的层次框架组成。它可以由七种不同类型的节点组成:单根节点、元素节点、文本节点、属性节点、注释节点、处理指令节点和命名空间节点。

trans-unit.source: The xmlns pseudo-attribute maps the shorthand name xsl onto the full namespace for use throughout the document that follows. Thus the stylesheet element above is prefixed with xsl:. Although xsl is the conventionally used shorthand name (called the prefix), it is not mandatory and it is quite possible to choose a different one. The examples in this article all assume the use of the xsl prefix.
trans-unit.target: xmlns伪属性将速记名称xsl映射到完整的名称空间，以在随后的整个文档中使用。因此，上面的样式表元素以 xsl: 为前缀。尽管xsl是常规使用的速记名称（称为前缀），但它不是强制性的，并且有可能选择其他名称。本文中的所有示例均假定使用xsl前缀。

trans-unit.source: The <xsl:sort> element defines a sort key for nodes selected by <xsl:apply-templates> or <xsl:for-each> and determines the order in which they are processed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <xsl:sort> 元素定义了由选择的节点排序关键字 <xsl:apply-templates> 或 <xsl:for-each> ，并确定在它们所处理的顺序。

trans-unit.source: There are some features in the XSLT 1.0 specification which Firefox unfortunately does not yet support. Specifically:
trans-unit.target: XSLT 1.0规范中的一些功能,遗憾的是Firefox还不支持。具体来说,就是

trans-unit.source: There are two types of elements discussed here: top-level elements and instructions. A top-level element must appear as the child of either <xsl:stylesheet> or <xsl:transform>. An instruction, on the other hand, is associated with a template. A stylesheet may include several templates. A third type of element, not discussed here, is the literal result element (LRE). An LRE also appears in a template. It consists of any non-instruction element that should be copied as-is to the result document, for example, an <hr> element in an HTML conversion stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 这里讨论了两种类型的元素：顶级元素和指令。顶级元素必须显示为 <xsl:stylesheet> 或 <xsl:transform> 的子元素。另一方面，指令与模板相关联。样式表可能包含多个模板。此处未讨论的第三种元素是文字结果元素（LRE）。 LRE也出现在模板中。它由应按原样复制到结果文档的任何非指令元素组成，例如，HTML转换样式表中的 <hr> 元素。

trans-unit.source: This W3Schools tutorial teaches the reader how to use XSLT to transform XML documents into other formats, like XHTML.
trans-unit.target: 这W3Schools的教程教读者如何使用XSLT将XML文档转换为其他格式，比如XHTML。

trans-unit.source: This advanced example sorts several divs based on their content. The example allows sorting the content multiple times, alternating between ascending and descending order. The JavaScript loads the .xsl file only on the first sort and sets the xslloaded variable to true once it has finished loading the file. Using the XSLTProcessor.getParameter() method, the code can figure whether to sort in ascending or descending order. It defaults to ascending if the parameter is empty (the first time the sorting happens, as there is no value for it in the XSLT file). The sorting value is set using XSLTProcessor.setParameter().
trans-unit.target: 这个高级示例根据其内容对几个div进行排序。该示例允许对内容进行多次排序，在升序和降序之间进行交替。 JavaScript仅在第一次排序时加载.xsl文件，并在完成加载文件 xslloaded 变量设置为true。使用 XSLTProcessor.getParameter() 方法，代码可以确定是按升序还是降序排序。如果参数为空，则默认为升序（第一次发生排序，因为XSLT文件中没有该值）。使用 XSLTProcessor.setParameter() 设置排序值。

trans-unit.source: This article lists some common problems using XSLT in Firefox.
trans-unit.target: 本文列出了在Firefox中使用XSLT的一些常见问题。

trans-unit.source: This article provides some XPath code snippets—simple examples of how to a few simple utility functions based on standard interfaces from the DOM Level 3 XPath specification that expose XPath functionality to JavaScript code. The snippets are functions you can use in the real world in your own code.
trans-unit.target: 本文提供了一些XPath代码段，这些简单的示例说明了如何基于DOM Level 3 XPath规范中的标准接口来一些简单的实用工具功能，这些标准接口将XPath功能暴露给JavaScript代码。这些片段是您可以在自己的代码中在现实世界中使用的功能。

trans-unit.source: This article provides some XPath code snippets—simple examples of how to a few simple utility functions based on standard interfaces from the DOM Level 3 XPath specification that expose XPath functionality to JavaScript code. The snippets are functions you can use in the real world in your own code.
trans-unit.target: 本文提供了一些XPath代码段，这些简单的示例说明了如何基于DOM Level 3 XPath规范中的标准接口来一些简单的实用程序功能，这些功能将XPath功能暴露给JavaScript代码。这些片段是您可以在自己的代码中在现实世界中使用的功能。

trans-unit.source: This article provides some XPath code snippets. The snippets are functions you can use in the real world in your own code.
trans-unit.target: 本文提供了一些XPath代码片段。这些代码段是你在现实世界中可以在自己的代码中使用的函数。

trans-unit.source: This article seeks to document the difference between CSS Selectors and XPath for web developers to be able to better choose the right tool for the right job.
trans-unit.target: 本文旨在记录CSS选择器和XPath的区别,以便Web开发人员能够更好地选择合适的工具来完成工作。

trans-unit.source: This could inadvertently grab some elements if one of its attributes existed that had a local name of "href", but it was a different attribute which had the targeted (XLink) namespace (instead of @href).
trans-unit.target: 如果存在其本地名称为“ href ”的属性之一，则可能会无意中捕获某些元素，但它是具有目标（XLink）名称空间（而不是 @href ）的另一个属性。

trans-unit.source: This document describes the JavaScript interface in Mozilla 1.2 and up to the XSLT Processing Engine (TransforMiiX).
trans-unit.target: 这个文档描述了Mozilla 1.2和XSLT处理引擎(TransforMiiX)的JavaScript接口。

trans-unit.source: This document describes the JavaScript interface to the XSLT processing engine in Mozilla 1.2 and up.
trans-unit.target: 本文档描述了Mozilla 1.2及以上版本的XSLT处理引擎的JavaScript接口。

trans-unit.source: This document describes the interface for using XPath in JavaScript internally, in extensions, and from websites. Mozilla implements a fair amount of the DOM 3 XPath, which means that XPath expressions can be run against both HTML and XML documents.
trans-unit.target: 本文档介绍了在内部，扩展名和网站中在JavaScript中使用XPath的界面。Mozilla实现了相当数量的DOM 3 XPath，这意味着XPath表达式可以针对HTML和XML文档运行。

trans-unit.source: This extensive introduction to XSLT and XPath assumes no prior knowledge of the technologies, and guides the reader through background, context, structure, concepts and introductory terminology.
trans-unit.target: 这本对XSLT和XPath的广泛介绍假设之前没有任何技术知识,并引导读者了解背景、环境、结构、概念和入门术语。

trans-unit.source: This function accepts two or more arguments. Each of these arguments is a string.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数接受两个或多个参数。每个参数都是一个字符串。

trans-unit.target: 这个函数是XPath的XSLT专用函数。它不是核心XPath函数库的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This function is useful part of a comparison:
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是比较有用的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This function should behave similarly to the boolean() function except that it returns the opposite value.
trans-unit.target: 此函数的行为应类似于boolean（）函数，但它返回相反的值。

trans-unit.source: This function should behave similarly to the boolean() function except that it returns the opposite value.
trans-unit.target: 此函数的行为应类似于boolean（）函数，但它返回相反的值。

trans-unit.source: This is a newsgroup that discusses Netscape-specific XSLT issues.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个讨论Netscap-specific XSLT问题的新闻组。

trans-unit.source: This is an example for illustration only. This function will need to take namespace prefixes from the xpathExpression and return the URI that corresponds to that prefix. For example, the expression:
trans-unit.target: 这仅是示例。此函数将需要从 xpathExpression 中获取名称空间前缀，并返回与该前缀相对应的URI。例如，表达式：

trans-unit.source: This is often used with the position() function to determine if a particular node is the last in a node-set.
trans-unit.target: 通常将其与position（）函数一起使用，以确定特定节点是否是节点集中的最后一个节点。

trans-unit.source: This method evaluates XPath expressions against an XML based document (including HTML documents), and returns a XPathResult object, which can be a single node or a set of nodes. The existing documentation for this method is located at document.evaluate, but it is rather sparse for our needs at the moment; a more comprehensive examination will be given below.
trans-unit.target: 此方法针对基于XML的文档（包括HTML文档）评估XPath表达式，并返回 XPathResult 对象，该对象可以是单个节点或一组节点。该方法的现有文档位于document.evaluate，但是目前我们的需求还很少。下面将进行更全面的检查。

trans-unit.source: This must be placed in the prolog section of the xml document.
trans-unit.target: 这必须放在xml文档的prolog部分。

trans-unit.source: This would result in the following:

To determine that type after evaluation, we use the resultType property of the XPathResult object. The constant values of this property are defined in the appendix. None Yet =====Any_Type Example===== <pre> </pre>
trans-unit.target: 为了在评估后确定该类型，我们使用 XPathResult 对象的 resultType 属性。此属性的常量值在附录中定义。还没有===== Any_Type示例===== <pre> </ pre>

trans-unit.source: To extract all the <h2> heading elements in an HTML document using XPath, the xpathExpression is simply '//h2'. Where, // is the Recursive Descent Operator that matches elements with the nodeName h2 anywhere in the document tree. The full code for this is: link to introductory xpath doc
trans-unit.target: 要使用XPath提取HTML文档中的所有 <h2> 标题元素， xpathExpression 就是' //h2 '。其中， // 是递归下降运算符，它与文档树中任何位置的nodeName h2 元素匹配。完整的代码是：链接到介绍性的xpath doc

trans-unit.source: To learn more about XSLT and XPath, see the For Further Reading section at the end of this article.
trans-unit.target: 要了解有关XSLT和XPath的更多信息，请参见本文结尾的“进一步阅读”部分。

trans-unit.source: To make the contents of the XML document available within the extension, we create an XMLHttpRequest object to load the document synchronously, the variable xmlDoc will contain the document as an XMLDocument object against which we can use the evaluate method
trans-unit.target: 为了使扩展中的XML文档的内容可用，我们创建了一个 XMLHttpRequest 对象来同步加载该文档，变量 xmlDoc 将包含该文档作为 XMLDocument 对象，我们可以使用 evaluate 方法

trans-unit.source: To solve this two new PIs are implemented in Firefox 2 (see Supported versions below for details), <?xslt-param?> and <?xslt-param-namespace?>. Both PIs can contain "pseudo attributes" the same way that the xml-stylesheet PI does.
trans-unit.target: 为解决此问题，Firefox 2中实现了两个新的PI （请参阅下面的受支持版本以获取详细信息）， <?xslt-param?> 和 <?xslt-param-namespace?> 。两个PI都可以包含“伪属性”，就像 xml-stylesheet PI一样。

trans-unit.source: To start, you need to create an XSLTProcessor object:
trans-unit.target: 首先，您需要创建一个 XSLTProcessor 对象：

trans-unit.source: Top-level or instruction. If it occurs as a top-level element, the variable is global in scope, and can be accessed throughout the document. If it occurs within a template, the variable is local in scope, accessible only within the template in which it appears.
trans-unit.target: 顶层或指令。如果它作为顶层元素出现,那么变量的范围是全局的,并且可以在整个文档中被访问。如果它出现在模板中,则该变量是局部范围的,只能在它出现的模板中访问。

trans-unit.source: Top-level, may appear in any order as a child of <xsl:stylesheet> or <xsl:transform>.
trans-unit.target: 顶级，可以按任何顺序显示为 <xsl:stylesheet> 或 <xsl:transform> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: Top-level, must appear before any other child of <xsl:stylesheet> or <xsl:transform> in the importing stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 顶级，必须出现在导入样式表中 <xsl:stylesheet> 或 <xsl:transform> 的任何其他子级之前。

trans-unit.source: Top-level, must be a child of <xsl:stylesheet> or <xsl:transform>.
trans-unit.target: 顶级，必须是 <xsl:stylesheet> 或 <xsl:transform> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: Top-level, must be the child <xsl:stylesheet> or <xsl:transform>.
Top-level, must be the child of <xsl:stylesheet> or <xsl:transform>.
trans-unit.target: 顶级，必须是 <xsl:stylesheet> 或 <xsl:transform> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: Transformations depend on the processor's being able to pinpoint individual nodes on the tree. To facilitate this, the W3C decided to use a separate language, XPath, which also has uses outside the XSLT context. As its name implies, XPath defines a "path" the processor must take through the tree to arrive at the desired node. This path consists of XPath-specific expressions to be evaluated, expressions which may include a number of conditions to be matched, a way of associating nodes, and/or an indication of directionality within the tree. A fuller description of the parts of XPath most commonly used in XSLT follows in the reference section.
trans-unit.target: 变换取决于处理器是否能够准确定位树上的各个节点。为了实现这一点,W3C决定使用一种单独的语言--XPath,它在XSLT上下文之外也有用途。顾名思义,XPath定义了一个 "路径",处理器必须通过树来到达所需的节点。这个路径由要评估的特定于XPath的表达式组成,这些表达式可能包括一些要匹配的条件,一种关联节点的方式,和/或树中的方向性指示。XSLT中最常用的XPath部分的更全面的描述在参考部分中。

trans-unit.source: Transforming XHTML should work as expected though.
trans-unit.target: 不过转化XHTML应该可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Transforming XML with For Further Reading
trans-unit.target: 使用XML转换 进一步阅读

trans-unit.source: Transforming XML with The Netscape XSLT XPath Reference
trans-unit.target: 使用Netscape XSLT XPath Reference转换XML。

trans-unit.source: True for an expression that evaluates to false; false for an expression that evaluates to true.
trans-unit.target: 对于求值为false的表达式,为true;对于求值为true的表达式,为false。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately it is currently not supported to transform HTML nodes using XSLT. Some things work if you use lower case node-names in patterns and expressions, and treat the nodes as if they are in the null namespace, however this is not very well tested so it might not work in all situations. It is also possible that this will change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是,目前不支持使用XSLT转换HTML节点。如果你在模式和表达式中使用小写的节点名,并将节点视为在null命名空间中,就会有一些效果,但是这并没有经过很好的测试,所以它可能在所有情况下都不适用。这也有可能在未来的版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Unlike CSS, which has its own specialized syntax, an XSLT stylesheet is an XML document, which must conform to all XML rules, including well-formedness. So the model for transformation is that one XML document is used to transform another XML document.
trans-unit.target: 与CSS不同,CSS有自己专门的语法,XSLT样式表是一个XML文档,它必须符合所有的XML规则,包括格式良好。所以转换的模式是,一个XML文档用来转换另一个XML文档。

trans-unit.source: Uses an XPath expression that specifies the nodes to be processed. An asterisk(*) selects the entire node-set. If this attribute is not set, all child nodes of the current node are selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用XPath表达式指定要处理的节点。星号（ * ）选择整个节点集。如果未设置此属性，则选择当前节点的所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Uses an XPath expression that specifies what is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 使用XPath表达式来指定要复制的内容。

trans-unit.source: Uses an XPath expression to provide a default value if none is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,则使用XPath表达式来提供一个默认值。

trans-unit.source: Uses an XPath expression to select nodes to be processed.
trans-unit.target: 使用XPath表达式来选择要处理的节点。

trans-unit.source: Uses an XPath expression to specify the nodes to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 使用XPath表达式来指定要排序的节点。

trans-unit.source: Using XPath functions to reference elements with a default namespace
trans-unit.target: 使用XPath函数来引用具有默认命名空间的元素。

trans-unit.source: Using the Mozilla JavaScript interface to XSL Transformations
trans-unit.target: 使用Mozilla JavaScript接口进行XSL转换

trans-unit.source: We create a namespace resolver using the createNSResolver method of the document object.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用文档对象的 createNSResolver 方法创建一个名称空间解析器。

trans-unit.source: We obtain the returned value of the expression by accessing the following properties respectively of the XPathResult object.
trans-unit.target: 我们分别通过访问 XPathResult 对象的以下属性来获取表达式的返回值。

trans-unit.source: What about querying URL parameters in the XSLT stylesheet? E.g. Passing them to specified <xsl:param>'s.
trans-unit.target: 如何查询XSLT样式表中的URL参数？例如，将它们传递给指定的<xsl：param>。

trans-unit.source: When the XPathResult object is not defined, the constants can be retrieved in privileged code using Components.interfaces.nsIDOMXPathResult.ANY_TYPE (CI.nsIDOMXPathResult). Similarly, an XPathEvaluator can be created using:
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义XPathResult对象，则可以使用 Components.interfaces.nsIDOMXPathResult.ANY_TYPE （ CI.nsIDOMXPathResult ）以特权代码检索常量。同样，可以使用以下方法创建XPathEvaluator：

trans-unit.source: When the desired result type in resultType is specified as either:
trans-unit.target: 当将 resultType 中的所需结果类型指定为以下任意一种时：

trans-unit.source: When the result type in the resultType parameter is specified as ANY_TYPE, the XPathResult object returned, will be whatever type that naturally results from the evaluation of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 当 resultType 参数中的结果类型指定为 ANY_TYPE 时，返回的 XPathResult 对象将是表达式表达式自然产生的任何类型。

trans-unit.source: When the specified result type in the resultType parameter is either:
trans-unit.target: 当 resultType 参数中指定的结果类型为以下任意一种时：

trans-unit.source: While one can adapt the approach in the above section to test for namespaced elements regardless of the prefix chosen (using local-name() in combination with namespace-uri() instead of name()), a more challenging situation occurs, however, if one wishes to grab an element with a particular namespaced attribute in a predicate (given the absence of implementation-independent variables in XPath 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以使用上一节中的方法来测试命名空间元素，而不管选择了什么前缀（使用 local-name() 结合 namespace-uri() 代替 name() ），但是，仍然存在更具挑战性的情况，如果希望在谓词中获取具有特定命名空间属性的元素（假设XPath 1.0中没有实现无关的变量）。

trans-unit.source: While running transformations using precoded .xsl and .xml files is quite useful, configuring the .xsl file from JavaScript may be even more useful. For example, JavaScript and XSLT could be used to sort XML data and then display it. The sorting would have to alternate between ascending and descending sorting.
trans-unit.target: 虽然使用预编码的.xsl和.xml文件运行转换相当有用,但从JavaScript配置.xsl文件可能更有用。例如,JavaScript和XSLT可以用来对XML数据进行排序,然后显示。排序必须在升序和降序之间交替进行。

trans-unit.source: While you can use IE loadXML method to load a string containing XML you have to perform some tweaking and tuning to do the same in Mozilla. You must use the DomParser.no to create any document, as this is handled by the DomParser.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以使用IE loadXML 方法加载包含XML的字符串，但您必须执行一些调整和调整才能在Mozilla中执行相同的操作。您必须使用DomParser.no来创建任何文档，因为该文档由DomParser处理。

trans-unit.source: With modern browsers supporting XSLT, developers can now use JavaScript to access the power that XSLT provides. JavaScript can enable a web application to load XML data, process it via XSLT into a presentable form and then add it into an existing document. Since the XML data loaded only contains the raw information without any presentation data, it can load quickly even on dialup.
trans-unit.target: 使用支持XSLT的现代浏览器，开发人员现在可以使用JavaScript来访问XSLT提供的功能。JavaScript可以使Web应用程序加载XML数据，通过XSLT将其处理为可呈现的形式，然后将其添加到现有文档中。由于加载的XML数据仅包含原始信息，而没有任何表示形式的数据，因此即使在拨号时也可以快速加载。

trans-unit.source:
XPath 1.0
The definition of 'child' in that specification.

XPath 1.0
The definition of 'self' in that specification.

XPath 2.0
The definition of 'child' in that specification.

XPath 2.0
The definition of 'self' in that specification.

XPath 3.0
The definition of 'child' in that specification.

XPath 3.0
The definition of 'self' in that specification.

XPath 3.1
The definition of 'child' in that specification.

XPath 3.1
The definition of 'self' in that specification.

XPath is mainly used in XSLT, but can also be used as a much more powerful way of navigating through the DOM of any XML-like language document, such as HTML and XUL, instead of relying on the document.getElementById method, the Node.childNodes properties, and other DOM Core features.
trans-unit.target: XPath主要用于XSLT中，但也可以用作导航任何类似XML的语言文档（例如HTML和XUL）的DOM的更强大的方法，而不是依赖于 document.getElementById 方法（即 Node.childNodes 属性和其他DOM Core功能。

trans-unit.source: XPath is mainly used in XSLT, but can also be used as a much more powerful way of navigating through the DOM of any XML-like language document using XPathExpression, such as HTML and SVG, instead of relying on the Document.getElementById() or ParentNode.querySelectorAll() methods, the Node.childNodes properties, and other DOM Core features.
trans-unit.target: XPath主要用于XSLT中，但也可以用作使用 XPathExpression （例如HTML和SVG）浏览任何类似XML的语言文档的DOM的更强大的方法，而不是依赖于 Document.getElementById() 或 ParentNode.querySelectorAll() 方法， Node.childNodes 属性和其他DOM Core功能。

trans-unit.source: XPath notes that the translate function is not a sufficient solution for case conversion in all languages. A future version of XPath may provide additional functions for case conversion.
trans-unit.target: XPath 指出,翻译函数并不是所有语言中大小写转换的充分解决方案。未来的XPath版本可能会提供额外的大小写转换功能。

trans-unit.source: XPath panel that integrates tightly into FireBug, providing an editor and inspector (FireFox Add-On).
trans-unit.target: 紧密集成到FireBug中的XPath面板,提供编辑器和检查器(FireFox附加组件)。

trans-unit.source: XPath stands for XML Path Language. It uses a non-XML syntax to provide a flexible way of addressing (pointing to) different parts of an XML document. It can also be used to test addressed nodes within a document to determine whether they match a pattern or not.
trans-unit.target: XPath代表XML路径语言。它使用非XML语法来提供一种灵活的方式来寻址（指向）XML文档的不同部分。它还可以用于测试文档中的寻址节点，以确定它们是否与模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: XPath stands for XML Path Language. It uses a non-XML syntax to provide a flexible way of addressing (pointing to) different parts of an XML document. It can also be used to test addressed nodes within a document to determine whether they match a pattern or not.
trans-unit.target: XPath代表XML路径语言。它使用非XML语法来提供一种灵活的方式来寻址（指向）XML文档的不同部分。它还可以用于测试文档中的寻址节点，以确定它们是否与模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: XPath uses a path notation (as in URLs) for navigating through the hierarchical structure of an XML document. It uses a non-XML syntax so that it can be used in URIs and XML attribute values.
trans-unit.target: XPath 使用路径符号(如 URL)来浏览 XML 文档的层次结构。它使用非XML语法,因此它可以用于URI和XML属性值。

trans-unit.source:
XSLT 3.0
The definition of '<xsl:stylesheet>' in that specification.
XSLT JS interface in Gecko.Advanced Example
XSLT JS interface in Gecko.Basic Example
XSLT JS interface in Gecko.Interface List
XSLT JS interface in Gecko.JavaScript XSLT Bindings
trans-unit.target: Gecko.JavaScript XSLT Bindings中的XSLT JS接口。

trans-unit.source: XSLT JS interface in Gecko.Setting Parameters

XSLT allows a stylesheet author to transform a primary XML document in two significant ways: manipulating and sorting the content, including a wholesale reordering of it if so desired, and transforming the content into a different format.
trans-unit.target: XSLT允许样式表作者以两种重要的方式转换一个初级XML文档:对内容进行操作和排序,包括如果需要的话对其进行整体的重新排序,以及将内容转换为不同的格式。

trans-unit.source: XSLT allows the author to directly manipulate the structure of a document. For example, it permits the rearranging and sorting of elements; it also provides more fine-grained control of the resulting document's structure.
trans-unit.target: XSLT允许作者直接操作文档的结构。例如,它允许对元素进行重新排列和排序;它还提供了对最终文档结构的更精细的控制。

trans-unit.source: XSLT is a high-level declarative language.
trans-unit.target: XSLT是一种高级声明式语言。

trans-unit.source: XSLT is most often used to convert data between different XML schemas or to convert XML data into web pages or PDF documents.
trans-unit.target: XSLT最常用来转换不同XML模式之间的数据,或者将XML数据转换为网页或PDF文档。

trans-unit.source: XSLT provides the xsl:param element, which is a child of the xsl:stylesheet element. XSLTProcessor provides three JavaScript methods to interact with these parameters: XSLTProcessor.setParameter(), XSLTProcessor.getParameter() and XSLTProcessor.removeParameter(). They all take as the first argument the namespace URI of the xsl:param (Usually the param will fall in the default namespace, so passing in null will suffice.) The local name of the xsl:param is the second argument. setParameter requires a third argument - namely the value to which the parameter will be set.
trans-unit.target: XSLT提供了 xsl:param 元素，它是 xsl:stylesheet 元素的子元素。 XSLTProcessor 提供了三种与这些参数交互的JavaScript方法： XSLTProcessor.setParameter() ， XSLTProcessor.getParameter() 和 XSLTProcessor.removeParameter() 。它们都将 xsl:param 的名称空间URI作为第一个参数（通常，参数将位于默认名称空间中，因此传递 null 就足够了。） xsl:param 的本地名称是第二个参数。 setParameter需要第三个参数-即将参数设置为的值。

trans-unit.source: XSLT supports the concept of passing parameters to a stylesheet when executing it. This has been possible for a while when using the XSLTProcessor in JavaScript. However when using an <?xml-stylesheet?> processing instruction (PI) there used to be no way to provide parameters.
trans-unit.target: XSLT支持在执行样式表时将参数传递给样式表的概念。在JavaScript中使用XSLTProcessor时，已经有一段时间了。但是，当使用 <?xml-stylesheet?> 处理指令（PI）时，以前无法提供参数。

trans-unit.source: XSLT uses XPath to address code segments in a XML document that it wishes to transform.
trans-unit.target: XSLT使用XPath来寻址它希望转换的XML文档中的代码段。
XSLT:可扩展样式表语言转换

trans-unit.source: Yet eventually much of the content stored in XML documents will need to be presented to human readers. Because a browser provides a familiar and highly flexible interface, it is an ideal mechanism for delivering such presentation versions of XML content. Built from the ground up utilizing a wide variety of XML technologies, Firefox incorporates within itself all of the mechanisms needed to process both original XML documents and the specialized stylesheets used to style and lay them out for HTML display, reducing server load with client-side processing.
trans-unit.target: 然而,存储在XML文档中的许多内容最终都需要呈现给人类读者。由于浏览器提供了一个熟悉的和高度灵活的界面,它是一个理想的机制来提供XML内容的展示版本。火狐浏览器是利用各种XML技术从头开始构建的,它本身就包含了处理原始XML文档和用于为HTML显示样式和布局的专用样式表所需的所有机制,减少了客户端处理的服务器负载。

trans-unit.source: You can also use XSLTProcessor.transformToFragment() which will return a DocumentFragment node. This is handy because appending a fragment to another node transparently appends all the children of that fragment, and the fragment itself is not merged. Fragments are therefore useful for moving nodes around and storing them without the overhead of a full document object.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 XSLTProcessor.transformToFragment() 来返回一个 DocumentFragment 节点。这很方便，因为将片段追加到另一个节点会透明地追加该片段的所有子代，并且片段本身不会合并。因此，片段对于在不移动整个文档对象的情况下移动节点并存储它们很有用。

trans-unit.source: You can control parameters for the stylesheet using the XSLTProcessor.setParameter(), XSLTProcessor.getParameter(), and XSLTProcessor.removeParameter() methods. These all take a namespace URI and a local name as the first two parameters, with XSLTProcessor.setParameter() taking a third - the value of the parameter to be set. See The XSLT/JavaScript Interface in Gecko for an example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 XSLTProcessor.setParameter() ， XSLTProcessor.getParameter() 和 XSLTProcessor.removeParameter() 方法来控制样式表的参数。这些都将名称空间URI和本地名称作为前两个参数，而 XSLTProcessor.setParameter() 则使用第三个参数-要设置的参数值。有关示例，请参见Gecko中的XSLT / JavaScript接口。

trans-unit.source: You can control parameters for the stylesheet using the XSLTProcessor.setParameter(), XSLTProcessor.getParameter(), and XSLTProcessor.removeParameter() methods. These all take a namespace URI and a local name as the first two parameters, with XSLTProcessor.setParameter() taking a third - the value of the parameter to be set. See The XSLT/JavaScript Interface in Gecko for an example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 XSLTProcessor.setParameter() ， XSLTProcessor.getParameter() 和 XSLTProcessor.removeParameter() 方法来控制样式表的参数。这些都将名称空间URI和本地名称作为前两个参数，而 XSLTProcessor.setParameter() 则使用第三个参数-要设置的参数值。有关示例，请参见Gecko中的XSLT / JavaScript接口。

trans-unit.source: You can now "query" the document with XPath expressions. Although walking the DOM tree can achieve similar results, using XPath expressions is much quicker and more powerful. If you can rely on id attributes, document.getElementById() is still powerful, but it's not nearly as powerful as XPath. Here are some examples.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以使用XPath表达式“查询”文档。尽管遍历DOM树可以实现类似的结果，但是使用XPath表达式更快，更强大。如果您可以依靠 id 属性， document.getElementById() 仍然很强大，但是却不如XPath强大。这里有些例子。

trans-unit.source: You can test if an element doesn't have some attribute.
trans-unit.target: 你可以测试一个元素是否没有某个属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the XSLTProcessor.transformToDocument() or XSLTProcessor.transformToFragment() methods to transform a document using the imported XSLT stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 XSLTProcessor.transformToDocument() 或 XSLTProcessor.transformToFragment() 方法来使用导入的XSLT样式表转换文档。

trans-unit.source: Your server needs to send both the source and the stylesheet with a XML mime type, text/xml or application/xml. To find out the current type, load the file in Mozilla and look at the page info. Or use a download tool, those usually tell the mime type.
trans-unit.target: 您的服务器需要发送XML MIME类型为 text/xml 或 application/xml 的源代码和样式表。要找出当前类型，请在Mozilla中加载文件，然后查看页面信息。或使用下载工具，通常会告诉哑剧类型。

trans-unit.source: a b c . . .y z aa ab . . .
trans-unit.target: a b c 。..y z aa ab...
一 二 三 四 五..

trans-unit.source: the . returns the bar node, which may be different from the current node.
trans-unit.target: 的 . 返回 bar 节点，该节点可能与当前节点不同。

trans-unit.source: will select all MathML expressions that are the children of (X)HTML table data cell elements.
trans-unit.target: 将选择所有（X）HTML表格数据单元元素的子代的MathML表达式。

trans-unit.source: xsl:vendor, a string identifying the vendor of the XSLT processor
trans-unit.target: xsl:vendor,一个标识XSLT处理器供应商的字符串。

trans-unit.source: xsl:vendor-url, a string containing a URL identifying the vendor of the XSLT processor; typically this is the host page (home page) of the vendor's Web site.
trans-unit.target: xsl:vendor-url,一个包含标识XSLT处理器供应商的URL的字符串;通常这是供应商网站的主机页面(主页)。

trans-unit.source: xsl:version, a number giving the version of XSLT implemented by the processor; for XSLT processors implementing the version of XSLT specified by this document, this is the number 1.0
trans-unit.target: xsl:version,给出处理器实现的XSLT版本的数字;对于实现本文档指定的XSLT版本的XSLT处理器,这个数字是1.0。
